(Simplified: 氩)
Chinese Definition:
①一種氣體元素，無色、無臭，是惰性氣體的一種，在真空管中通電時發出藍色光。

氬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yà］
“氩1”的繁体字。
稀有气体元素之一。符号A或Ar［新拉argonium］。无色无臭。惰性。可凝结成液体或白色结晶。化合力极差，不易导热。用于高温冶炼纯金属和充气灯泡。

Basic explanation of words

yà

Argon
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yà］
Traditional characters for "argon 1".
One of the rare gas elements. Symbol A or Ar [new pull argonium]. Colorless and odorless. Inert. Can condense into liquid or white crystals. The compounding force is extremely poor, and it is not easy to conduct heat. Used for high-temperature smelting of pure metals and gas-filled bulbs.
